metadata.title: CVE-2012-5196 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
Multiple buffer overflows in Condor 7.6.x before 7.6.10 and 7.8.x before7.8.4 have unknown impact and attack vectors.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2012-5196` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

htcondor - 8.0.5~dfsg.1-1ubuntu1
libclassad5 - 8.0.5~dfsg.1-1ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: condor package in trusty, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '8.0.5~dfsg.1-1ubuntu1').
